postCreateCommand: echo "[postCreateCommand] Value of containerWorkspaceFolder: [${containerWorkspaceFolder}]"; if [[ "${containerWorkspaceFolder}" == /workspaces/* || "${containerWorkspaceFolder}" == /workspace ]] && [ -d "${containerWorkspaceFolder}" ]; then echo "[postCreateCommand] Attempting to chown '${containerWorkspaceFolder}' to vscode:users..."; sudo chown -R vscode:users "${containerWorkspaceFolder}"; echo "[postCreateCommand] Chown completed on '${containerWorkspaceFolder}'"; else echo "[postCreateCommand] SKIPPING chown: containerWorkspaceFolder ('${containerWorkspaceFolder}') is not a typical workspace path (e.g., under /workspaces/ or /workspace) or does not exist."; fi
